about_the_game:
Demo:

There are 12 Stage and 1 Infinite Mode in this Demo.

-----------------------------------------------------------
WASDJK is a maze adventure game, but you won't be able to see the maze scenes like in regular games, and only have chaotic operation hints to guide your path.

Game controls:

From the game name, it can be seen that the game will use WASDJK operation. If you choose to use a controller, the direction control will use the cross key operation, but it will not replace the display of WASD operation.

Game mode:

-Stage Mode: The basic plot flow allows you to cross traps, challenge strong enemies, and face the final showdown during this maze journey.
-Endless Mode: Unlocked after passing through the Stage Mode, it is a variety of different types of survival racing challenges.

name: WASDJK Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Complete a adventure story in this maze with only operation hints.
